means: 的问句时，只能用because不能用for.再者，for不能跟

sentence.Network_en: You flatter yourself. Why would we go to such ludicrous lengths?
sentence.Network_cn: 你真自以为是。我们为什么要费那么大的力气？

sentence.Network_en: Why are Geography, Drama, Art and English in the ascendant?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么地理、戏剧、艺术和英语逐渐受宠？

sentence.Network_en: He wonders why the digits on his calculator slope to the right.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不明白为什么他的计算器上面的数字向右倾斜。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...人接触现在，完形治疗者常会以现在式的问句问“什么”（what）和“如何”（how）的问题，而很少问“为什么”（why）的问题。因为完形治疗认为问“为什么”只会引导当事人去编造合理化的解释及自我欺骗，将导致当事人不停地、.
关键原因（Why）：向领导请示问题不是随随便便的，请示前应该对请示原因有个圆满的说法。关键方式（How）：方式不同，请教 …
的为何(why)、如何(How)、何处(where)与谁(who)等议题，已有不少的文献探讨，但对于投资时机(when)与产业群聚对区位选择之影 …
我们为什麽(Why)要进行该操作—是否真的需要?  在什麽(Where)地方进行该操作—内部还是外部?

list.abs: 新概念英语第二册课堂笔记——lesson 5 ... ≠out of the way: 让路 That's why: 那就是为什么，前者是原因 another: 另外一个.
would you tell me why you climbed up the tree ., 能告诉我你为什么爬到树上去吗.
何怎么组词_百度知道 ... 何遽[ how] 何苦[ why bother] 你何苦为这点鸡毛蒜皮的事跟他吵 [呢] ?[ is it worth the trouble].
大学生信仰情况问卷调查统计结果--科技--人民网 ... better future life（ 更好的未来） Why not（ 为什么不） get tived（ 去尝试）.
字典中盖字的解释 ... (4) 何[ why] (5) 何不[ why not] (4) 雨伞[ umbrella].

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hwī, hwȳ 'by what cause', instrumental case of hwæt 'what', of Germanic origin

encyclopedia.content: 歌手单曲《Why》王力宏《Why》 歌曲：why 歌手：王力宏 专辑：唯一 w-h-y 我的完美世界还一直都不肯来 w-h-y w-h-y-y 就算红配绿 生活还是要继续 跟着他的旋律 我丢个黑色的歌词飞射 射到灰色的耳膜就象个镭射 盗版是怎么回事 现在的唱片公司同时都说赔死 类似被一个锤子用力的打下那个让人唱歌高八度的位置不可能再大卖 如果有更好的未来我看不出来 w-h-y 我的完美世界还一直都不肯来 w-h-y w-h-y-y 就算红配绿 生活还是要继续

entry.def: You use why in questions when you ask about the reasons for something.

example.ex: Why hasn't he brought the whisky?...
example.tran: 他为什么没把威士忌拿来？

entry.def: You use why at the beginning of a clause in which you talk about the reasons for something.

example.ex: He still could not throw any further light on why the elevator could have become jammed...
example.tran: 对于电梯为什么会卡住他仍旧给不出更多的解释。

example.ex: Experts wonder why the US government is not taking similarly strong actions against AIDS in this country...
example.tran: 专家们对为什么美国政府没在这个国家采取类似的强硬措施来对抗艾滋病而感到疑惑。

entry.def: You use why to introduce a relative clause after the word 'reason'.

example.ex: There's a reason why women don't read this stuff; it's not funny...
example.tran: 女人不读这种东西是有原因的，它并不好笑。

example.ex: Unless you're ill, there's no reason why you can't get those 15 minutes of walking in daily.
example.tran: 除非你病了，否则你没有理由每天连走15分钟都做不到的。

entry.tran: (问句中与 not 连用表示建议)为什么(不)
entry.def: You use why with 'not' in questions in order to introduce a suggestion.

example.ex: Why not give Claire a call?...
example.tran: 为什么不给克莱尔打个电话？

example.ex: Why don't you come home with me until you sort things out?...
example.tran: 你何不先和我一起回家，等事情解决了再走？

entry.tran: (问句中与 not 连用表示恼怒或气愤)为什么(不)
entry.def: You use why with 'not' in questions in order to express your annoyance or anger.

example.ex: Why don't you look where you're going?...
example.tran: 走路怎么不看着点儿道呢？

example.ex: Why don't they just leave it alone?

entry.tran: (表示同意别人的建议)为什么不呢，好，行
entry.def: You say why not in order to agree with what someone has suggested.

example.ex: 'Want to spend the afternoon with me?' — 'Why not?'...
example.tran: “想和我共度这个下午吗？”——“好啊！”

example.ex: 'Shall I tell them about poor Mrs Blair?'—'Why not?'
example.tran: “我应该告诉他们可怜的布莱尔太太的情况吗？”——“为什么不呢？”

entry.tran: (用于句首表示惊讶、震惊或生气)哎呀，哟，嗨
entry.def: People say 'Why!' at the beginning of a sentence when they are surprised, shocked, or angry.

example.ex: Why, this is nothing but common vegetable soup...
example.tran: 啊，这只不过是普通的蔬菜汤而已。

means.word_mean: 1. the cause or intention underlying an action or situation, especially in the phrase `the whys and wherefores'
1. question word; what is the reason (`how come' is a nonstandard variant);

sentences.sentence: "how come he got an ice cream cone but I didn't?"

auth_sentence.content: Why Rory, rather than any other young sportsman?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why Rory, rather than any other young sportsman?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why Rory, rather than any other young sportsman?

auth_sentence.content: Why are there so many colours in this species?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why are there so many colours in this species?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why are there so many colours in this species?

auth_sentence.content: So why is such a misleading picture being painted?
auth_sentence.res_content: So why is such a misleading picture being painted?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So why is such a misleading picture being painted?

Sentence.sentence: Oh… Why don't you use the ladder?
So here's a suggestion offered by two researchers at the Rand Corporation: Why not take a lesson from alcohol control policies and apply them to where food is sold and how it's displayed?
Why did Alex fail to receive the warm response he had hoped for?
The College Essay: Why Those 500 Words Drive Us Crazy
Question 15: Why did Dennis Hutton go to New York?
Why did James Dean move back to Indiana when he was young?

sentences.en: Why not call on me tomorrow?
sentences.cn: 你干吗不明天就来看我呢?

sentences.en: That is why I'm working hard at my lesson.
sentences.cn: 就是这个原因, 我要努力学习。

sentences.en: I can't understand why he failed.
sentences.cn: 我不明白他为什么失败了。

sentences.en: That is the reason why we must go now.
sentences.cn: 那就是我们现在必须走的理由。

sentences.en: Why ever didn't you tell us before?
sentences.cn: 你怎么不早告诉我们呢?
嗨, 这又有什么害处呢?

jushi.english: Tell me the reason why you came.
Why not apologize and ask his pardon?
jushi.chinese: 为什么不道个歉,请求他原谅呢?

jushi.english: “I'm going to put this whole weekend down,minute by minute.”“Why not?”
jushi.chinese: “我准备把这个周末的情况一分钟一分钟地记下来。” “对嘛。”
